h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Centipede Guai
content: Dozens of smaller centipedes will roll over the nearby ledge and into the arena to chase you on multiple fronts, and explode on impact.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Webbed_Hollow-Middle_Hollow_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Webbed Hollow - Middle Hollow Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Centipede Guai'.
The content is as follows:
Dozens of smaller centipedes will roll over the nearby ledge and into the arena to chase you on multiple fronts, and explode on impact.
